title: Jesus Grants Marcelino's Wish: The Miracle of Marcelino (1955) Religion, Drama | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Jesus Grants Marcelino's Wish: The Miracle of Marcelino (1955) Religion, Drama | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Marcelino, an orphan raised in a monastery, shares his meal with an old wooden Jesus figure, which miraculously accepts the offering. In return, Marcelino is granted a wish to see his mother.

Original title: Marcelino pan y vino (1955) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/rmw2oqiW4Jw


Director: Ladislao Vajda
Writers: José María Sánchez SilvaLadislao Vajda
Stars: Rafael Rivelles, Antonio Vico, Juan Calvo
Genres: Colorized, Comedy, Drama

This film is available with English & Spanish audio, and has many subtitle language options.

@CultCinemaClassics
